titleInfo.title: Church of the True Believers in Jesus' Name service, 1998 May 9

mods.abstract: Video recording of a service that opens with prayers followed by testimony from Shade Miller, Branden Nietzel, Gail Miller, and Delphia Nietzel. Two women who recently converted lead singing, which is followed by preaching by Shade Miller. Congregants lay hands on one another, which gives way to song and testimony from Billy Lemming. The service concludes with a discussion about the validity of serpent handling.
